definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

pinyin: xian4 piao4 ling4 he2 gan1 san1 lin2 suan1

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the determination of in Folium Cajani by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立木豆葉中牡荊苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Aim To study optimial technology for autogenesis -enzyme hydrolysis of total flavonoid glycoside in scutellaria.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黃芩自生酶催化水解總黃酮苷的工藝條件。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討僞人蔘皁苷GQ抗運動性疲勞的功效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the features of stilbene glycoside's stability.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二苯乙烯苷體外穩定性的特徵。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effects of saponins of Panax japonicus on tumor model mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究竹節參總皁苷對小鼠腫瘤模型的影響。

sentences.english: The research aimed to establish a method for the determination of paeoniflor in Jianganle particle by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 建立健肝樂顆粒中芍藥苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content icariin in the extract of Gushuling.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定骨疏靈提取物中淫羊藿苷的含量。

sentences.english: The second part of this experiment is the study of the apoptotic effects of sarsasapogenin on human hepatoma HepG2 cells.
sentences.chinese: 實驗的第二部分爲菝葜皁苷元生物學活性的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the content determination of paeoniflorin in Gujing Pill.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立固精丸中芍藥苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: HPLC method was used to determine aurantiamarin in orange peel.
sentences.chinese: 用HPLC法測定陳皮中橙皮苷的含量。

sentences.english: To establish a HPLC method for the determination the content of Baicalin in Xiakang Particles.
sentences.chinese: 建立蝦康顆粒中黃芩苷含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: The content of paeoniflorin in Wuling pellet was determined with HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 對五靈顆粒中芍藥苷的含量進行測定。

sentences.english: Cherry pits are full of cyanogenic glycosides.
Similarly, rats injected with high levels of uridine were equally tenacious.
sentences.chinese: 在注射了大量尿苷的大鼠中，也發現了同樣的現象。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of geniposide in Jieyu Anshen capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定解鬱安神膠囊中梔子苷含量的方法。

definition: old term for 糖苷[tang2 gan1], glycoside
